property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: Pakistani farmer in the northern Battagram district

note.text: In Pakistan, social class is connected to caste. Caste refers to a hereditary system of status and professions. Many Pakistanis are resistant to the very idea of caste. In fact, talking about kinship is a way of avoiding discussion of caste.
The highest of the ranked castes are the "syeds," thought to be descendants of the Prophet Mohammed.
